titleStmt.title: A sub-poena from the star-chamber of heauen A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse the 4. of August. 1622. With some particular enlargements which the limited time would not then allow. By Dan. Donne, Master of Arts, and minister of the Word.
titleStmt.author: Donne, Daniel, d. 1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Augustine Mathewes for Iohn Grismond, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Alley at the signe of the Gunne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
With: Heauens ioy, for a sinners repentance / by Iohn Denison. London : Printed by G.P. for Iohn Budge ..., 1623.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Alley at the signe of the Gunne
